Languages.Title: Plays
Languages.Content:
Plays help you manage your **customer onboarding** and **workflow communications** more effectively. It automates messages and tasks on customer's account engagement  metrics. 

It also help you define **milestones**, **activities** and **tasks** to effectively execute your **customer success process**.

* * *

#### How to configure plays?
Follow the below steps to configure plays

1. Click on **Settings** from the **navigation bar** 
2. Select **Configurations** â†’ **Plays**

* * *

#### How to create a Play ?

1. From the plays page, click on the **Create play** button from the top right corner

2. Add details on the **Name of the Play**,**Trigger Criteria**,  Days to Complete


3. If the trigger criteria is set to **Events**, choose the **Conditions** and set filters accordingly
4. Enter desired filter criteria and set the **Condition** to **trigger** the **Event condition**

![2_Screenshot_Plays_How_to_create_a_play](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Plays_How_to_create_a_play.png){height="" width=""}

5. Choose from **Enable**/**Disable**  to enable or disable the play
6. Choose **Now** or **Later** to activate the Play accordingly
:::(Info) (Note:)
If you chose later, you'll need to add the date on which the play is intented to be activated.
:::

5. Click on **Next** (This opens the Milestones and activity page)
:::(Info) (Note)
Add at least one milestone and activity to create a Play
:::
6. Click on **Add milestone** and then **Add activity** (You can add **task**, and **automate emails** and campaings from here)
7. Click on **Complete**

![2_Screenshot_Add_milestone_New](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Add_milestone_New.png){height="" width=""}


:::(Info) (Note:)
The saved play is shown successfully on the Configuration of Plays home page with details on the number of accounts that it is active, not started, in progress, and completed accounts applicable for that play.

![4_New_Screenshot_Plays](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/4_New_Screenshot_Plays.png){height="" width=""}


:::
 

* * *


#### Q&A 
 1. Can we edit and delete a particular Play?
     **Yes!** You can edit and delete a particular play in the settings page.
 2. Can we manually add Play?
       **Yes!** Plays can be manually added when the trigger criteria is set as CSM.
 3. How to automatically add Play?
           To automatically add play, select the trigger condition as Events in the play configuration. Click on auto assign check box to auto assign the play to a new customer.


* * *

### How to verify an activated play ?
Once a Play is saved and activated successfully, it should reflect in the Overall Play and under the Individual Company page.

Follow the below steps to verify it:

1. From the Homepage, navigate to the **Customers** tab  
2. Click on the intended **Customer name** that is associated with a play 
3. Click on the **Plays** tab under the Individual customer overview page (The Plays associated with the particular customer are shown in a grid with **Status**, **Progress**, **Start Date**, **Due Date**, **Milestones**, and **Activities**)
![2_Screenshot_Play_individualplaygrid](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Play_individualplaygrid.png){height="" width=""}

4. Click on the Play (This shows detailed Play status, Milestone and Activities)
 

![2_Screenshot_Plays_playdetail](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Plays_playdetail.png){height="" width=""}
 
:::(Info) (**Note:**)
* You can add, edit, or delete an **Activity** or **Milestone**. 
**CSM users** can change the status of the Activity. 

* After the status is changed, the **% complete** and **Past due Days** are also updated.

:::
